metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the Gur Hunter at the Gur Camp.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Oring Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moment - Gur CampApproach the camp, skil the main dialogClick on the Gur Hunter

0.speaker: Gandrel
0.text: It is not me you need to speak to. Ulma will see you.

1.speaker: Gandrel
1.text: I apologise, my friend, but we need the spawn - not you.

2.speaker: Gandrel
2.text: We can do nothing for you here. All that is left is to face the beast Cazador.
